EmailTemplate.description: Notifying Project Manager/Other On Project Manager feedback cancellation when mentor recalls KRA Request
EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Project Manager/Other On Project Manager feedback Recall
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Feedback On {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} Canceled For The Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c},
We hope this message finds you well.
This is to inform you that, due to the following reason submitted by {!PM_Configure__c.Mentor__c} below, you will no longer be able to submit your KRA feedback on {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} for the Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c}. As a result, your feedback record has been cancelled by the system.
Reason Stated: {!PM_Configure__c.Recall_FeedBack_Comments__c}
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. Thank you for your consideration.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
